txt.en:
'You have done well helping me out, and I think the farm is ready for the market!

'The tools are put away, the weeds pulled, the scarecrows out and the flowers planted... I cannot think of anything else I would do!

'Please let Albin Northcotton know that the chores are done.'
'So the farm is in a presentable state? We had been ignoring those chores for weeks. I'm impressed you got them done so quickly.'
All of the chores have been done to get the farm ready for the market.
Albin Northcotton is at the market area.\n\nAlbin Northcotton will want to know that all the chores are done and the farm is ready.
